H1.text: which is the lion 's mane jellyfish 's species within its genus. Cyanea spectabilis

H2.text: which is the lion 's mane jellyfish 's species within its genus. Cyanea grandis

H3.text: which is the lion 's mane jellyfish 's species within its genus. capillata

A4.text: The lion's mane jellyfish is also known as the arctic red jellyfish, hair jelly, snottie, sea blubber or giant jellyfish.

A5.text: The lion's mane jellyfish (Cyanea capillata) is one of the largest known species of jellyfish.
